model

Class OffLineModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.OffLineModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model

    public class OffLineModel
extends java.util.Observable
implements Model
    The Offline class extends Observable and implements Model. It is the part that makes all the calculations, such as creating a maze, and finding a solution for it.
    Since:
    17.5.2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bar Magnezi and Senia Kalma

      • generateMaze

        public void generateMaze(java.lang.String name,
                         int col,
                         int row)
        This method generates a maze using threads with an inputed data. After it finishes it sent a notification with as "maze "+name+" is ready.".
        Specified by:
        generateMaze in interface Model
        Parameters:
        name - The name we want to give the maze.
        col - The number of columns our maze will have (>2)
        row - The number of rows our maze will have (>2)

      • solveMaze

        public void solveMaze(java.lang.String name)
        This method solves a maze using threads. After it finishes it sent a notification with as "solution "+name+" is ready.".
        Specified by:
        solveMaze in interface Model
        Parameters:
